嫰字的基本解释

嫰
nèn
古同“嫩”。

嫰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nèn］
［《廣韻》奴困切，去慁，泥。］
亦作“嫰1”。
(1)指物初生时的柔弱状态。
(2)形容柔和，柔软。
(3)指事物尚处在开始或轻微的状态。
(4)指年幼。
(5)形容颜色新鲜浅淡。
(6)谓不老练。
(7)指水沸或食物烹调的时间短。
(8)喻不坚牢。参见“嫩約”。

嫰字的康熙字典解释

Tender
Basic explanation of words
Tender
nèn
Ancient with "nen".
Tender
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nèn］
["Guangyun" Slave cut, go sullen, mud. ]
Also known as "nen 1".
(1) Refers to the weak state of a thing when it is born.
(2) Describe soft and soft.
(3) Refers to the beginning or slight state of things.
(4) Refers to young.
(5) Describe the freshness and lightness of the color.
(6) That is not sophisticated.
(7) Refers to the short time for boiling water or cooking food.
(8) Yu is not firm. See "Tender Covenant."
